data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Santa Rosa Island, California, USA (SRS)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Santa Rosa Island, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2004-02-11. The instrument depth was 003 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
